71  /**
72   * The external service endpoint acts as a location for external apis to query the current server of the external
73   * supported API.
74   */
75  @Path("/api")
76  @Produces({ ApiMediaType.JSON, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_0_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_1_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_2_0,
77              ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_3_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_4_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_5_0,
78              ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_6_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_7_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_8_0,
79              ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_9_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_10_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_11_0})
80  @RestService(name = "externalapiservice", title = "External API Service", notes = {},
81               abstractText = "Provides a location for external apis to query the current server of the API.")
82  @Tag(name = "External API", description = "The external service endpoint acts as a location for external apis to query the current server of the external supported API.")
83  @Component(
84      immediate = true,
85      service = BaseEndpoint.class,
86      property = {
87          "service.description=External API - Base Endpoint",
88          "opencast.service.type=org.opencastproject.external",
89          "opencast.service.path=/api"
90      }
91  )
92  @JaxrsResource
93  public class BaseEndpoint {
94  
95    /** The logging facility */
96    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BaseEndpoint.class);
97  
98    /** Base URL of this endpoint */
99    protected String endpointBaseUrl;
100 
101   /* OSGi service references */
102   private SecurityService securityService;
103 
104   /** OSGi DI */
105   @Reference
106   void setSecurityService(SecurityService securityService) {
107     this.securityService = securityService;
108   }
109 
110   /** OSGi activation method */
111   @Activate
112   void activate(ComponentContext cc) {
113     logger.info("Activating External API - Base Endpoint");
114 
115     final Tuple<String, String> endpointUrl = getEndpointUrl(cc, OpencastConstants.EXTERNAL_API_URL_ORG_PROPERTY,
116             RestConstants.SERVICE_PATH_PROPERTY);
117     endpointBaseUrl = UrlSupport.concat(endpointUrl.getA(), endpointUrl.getB());
118     logger.debug("Configured service endpoint is {}", endpointBaseUrl);
119   }
120 
121   @GET
122   @Path("")
123   @RestQuery(name = "getendpointinfo", description = "Returns key characteristics of the API such as the server name and the default version.", returnDescription = "", responses = {
124           @RestResponse(description = "The api information is returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK) })
125   @Operation(
126       summary = "Get API information",
127       description = "Returns key characteristics of the API such as the server name and the default version."
128   )
129   @ApiResponse(responseCode = "200", description = "The api information is returned.")
130   public Response getEndpointInfo() {
131     Organization organization = securityService.getOrganization();
132     String orgExternalAPIUrl = organization.getProperties().get(OpencastConstants.EXTERNAL_API_URL_ORG_PROPERTY);
133 
134     String url;
135     if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(orgExternalAPIUrl)) {
136       url = orgExternalAPIUrl;
137     } else {
138       url = endpointBaseUrl;
139     }
140 
141     JsonObject json = new JsonObject();
142     json.addProperty("url", url);
143     json.addProperty("version", ApiVersion.CURRENT_VERSION.toString());
144 
145     return RestUtil.R.ok(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE, json.toString());
146   }
147 
148   @GET
149   @Path("info/me")
150   @RestQuery(name = "getuserinfo", description = "Returns information on the logged in user.", returnDescription = "", responses = {
151           @RestResponse(description = "The user information is returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK) })
152   @Operation(summary = "Get user information", description = "Returns information on the logged in user.")
153   @ApiResponse(responseCode = "200", description = "The user information is returned.")
154   public Response getUserInfo() {
155     final User user = securityService.getUser();
156 
157     JsonObject json = new JsonObject();
158     json.addProperty("email", safeString(user.getEmail()));
159     json.addProperty("name", user.getName());
160     json.addProperty("provider", user.getProvider());
161     json.addProperty("userrole", getUserIdRole(user.getUsername()));
162     json.addProperty("username", user.getUsername());
163 
164     return RestUtil.R.ok(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE, json.toString());
165   }
166 
167   @GET
168   @Path("info/me/roles")
169   @RestQuery(name = "getuserroles", description = "Returns current user's roles.", returnDescription = "", responses = {
170           @RestResponse(description = "The set of roles is returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK) })
171   @Operation(summary = "Get user roles", description = "Returns current user's roles.")
172   @ApiResponse(responseCode = "200", description = "The set of roles is returned.")
173   public Response getUserRoles() {
174     final User user = securityService.getUser();
175 
176     JsonArray roles = new JsonArray();
177     for (final Role role : user.getRoles()) {
178       roles.add(role.getName());
179     }
180 
181     return RestUtil.R.ok(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE, roles.toString());
182   }
183 
184   @GET
185   @Path("info/organization")
186   @RestQuery(name = "getorganizationinfo", description = "Returns the current organization.", returnDescription = "", responses = {
187           @RestResponse(description = "The organization details are returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK) })
188   @Operation(summary = "Get organization information", description = "Returns the current organization.")
189   @ApiResponse(responseCode = "200", description = "The organization details are returned.")
190   public Response getOrganizationInfo() {
191     final Organization org = securityService.getOrganization();
192 
193     JsonObject json = new JsonObject();
194     json.addProperty("adminRole", org.getAdminRole());
195     json.addProperty("anonymousRole", org.getAnonymousRole());
196     json.addProperty("id", org.getId());
197     json.addProperty("name", org.getName());
198 
199     return RestUtil.R.ok(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE, json.toString());
200   }
201 
202   @GET
203   @Path("info/organization/properties")
204   @RestQuery(name = "getorganizationproperties", description = "Returns the current organization's properties.", returnDescription = "", responses = {
205           @RestResponse(description = "The organization properties are returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK) })
206   @Operation(summary = "Get organization properties", description = "Returns the current organization's properties.")
207   @ApiResponse(responseCode = "200", description = "The organization properties are returned.")
208   public Response getOrganizationProperties() {
209     final Organization org = securityService.getOrganization();
210 
211     JsonObject json = new JsonObject();
212     for (Entry<String, String> prop : org.getProperties().entrySet()) {
213       json.addProperty(prop.getKey(), safeString(prop.getValue()));
214     }
215 
216     return RestUtil.R.ok(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE, json.toString());
217   }
218 
219   @GET
220   @Path("info/organization/properties/engageuiurl")
221   @RestQuery(name = "getorganizationpropertiesengageuiurl", description = "Returns the engage ui url property.", returnDescription = "", responses = {
222           @RestResponse(description = "The engage ui url is returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK) })
223   @Operation(summary = "Get organization properties engage ui url", description = "Returns the engage ui url property.")
224   @ApiResponse(responseCode = "200", description = "The engage ui url is returned.")
225   public Response getOrganizationPropertiesEngageUiUrl() {
226     final Organization org = securityService.getOrganization();
227     String keyToFind = "org.opencastproject.engage.ui.url";
228 
229     String value = null;
230     for (Entry<String, String> prop : org.getProperties().entrySet()) {
231       if (prop.getKey().equals(keyToFind)) {
232         value = prop.getValue() != null ? prop.getValue() : "";
233         break;
234       }
235     }
236 
237     if (value == null) {
238       value = safeString(UrlSupport.DEFAULT_BASE_URL);
239     }
240 
241     JsonObject json = new JsonObject();
242     json.addProperty(keyToFind, value);
243 
244     return RestUtil.R.ok(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE, json.toString());
245   }
246 
247   @GET
248   @Path("version")
249   @RestQuery(name = "getversion", description = "Returns a list of available version as well as the default version.", returnDescription = "", responses = {
250           @RestResponse(description = "The default version is returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK) })
251   @Operation(summary = "Get available versions", description = "Returns a list of available version as well as the default version.")
252   @ApiResponse(responseCode = "200", description = "The default version is returned.")
253   public Response getVersion() throws Exception {
254     List<String> versions = new ArrayList<>();
255     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_0_0.toString());
256     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_1_0.toString());
257     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_2_0.toString());
258     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_3_0.toString());
259     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_4_0.toString());
260     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_5_0.toString());
261     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_6_0.toString());
262     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_7_0.toString());
263     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_8_0.toString());
264     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_9_0.toString());
265     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_10_0.toString());
266     versions.add(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_11_0.toString());
267     JsonObject json = new JsonObject();
268     json.add("versions", collectionToJsonArray(versions));
269     json.addProperty("default", ApiVersion.CURRENT_VERSION.toString());
270     return RestUtil.R.ok(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE, json.toString());
271   }
272 
273   @GET
274   @Path("version/default")
275   @RestQuery(name = "getversiondefault", description = "Returns the default version.", returnDescription = "", responses = {
276           @RestResponse(description = "The default version is returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK) })
277   @Operation(summary = "Get default version", description = "Returns the default version.")
278   @ApiResponse(responseCode = "200", description = "The default version is returned.")
279   @Schema(name = "Version")
280   public Response getVersionDefault() throws Exception {
281     JsonObject json = new JsonObject();
282     json.addProperty("default", ApiVersion.CURRENT_VERSION.toString());
283     return RestUtil.R.ok(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE, json.toString());
284   }
